content.text: I'm working on accepting myself for who I am, even if my life is filled with contradictions. What's your biggest fear?
Hi! My biggest fear is not being able to overcome my eating disorder and being stuck in this cycle forever. What are you working on?
I'm glad you're working on it! It's something I've struggled with in the past too. I'm trying to express myself more and find my purpose in life.
That's awesome! I also want to learn how to express my emotions more effectively in romantic relationships.
I've been there too, it's definitely not easy. I'm still working on that myself.
It's nice to know I'm not alone!
Me too! I'm glad we can talk about this.
Yeah, me too. It's nice to have someone to relate to.
Do you have any hobbies or interests?
I love to play video games and I'm also really into Linux.
That's cool! I love to play video games too. What's your favorite game?
I love playing Quake on Slackware Linux. It's a really challenging game and it's really fun to play.
I've never played Quake, but I've heard good things about it. I'll have to check it out!
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'm glad you're enjoying your hobbies! I'm working on finding some new ones myself
